content: two patterns in one ravelry melinda miller designs facebook crochet time with melinda miller designs blog mocrochet - melinda miller crochet designs email mocrochet@yahoo com © 2018 melinda miller all rights reserved crown jewels copyright - this crown jewels pattern is copyright 2018 by melinda miller per copyright law do not redistribute with or without charge in any form without express written permission redistributing to others includes by photocopies scanning emailing putting on a cd posting in internet forum messages putting on another web site and any other manner of distribution page 2 instructions multi-color square with a chain 5 join with slip_stitch to form a ring or work a magic_ring round 1 chain 3 count as double_crochet 15 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-3 finish off 16 double_crochet round 2 join b with slip_stitch to any double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in same st popcorn in next double_crochet 2
